textAfterTable: 10 Songs Biography Formed: 1966 in Middlesex, England Genre: Rock Years Active: '60s, '80s They could've been contenders — hell, they should've been contenders! That's the first thought that passes through one's head as one hears the early singles by the Creation — and, indeed, how they weren't contenders is astonishing. They had it all, the in-house songwriting, the production, the voices, and the sound that should've put them right up there with the Who and ahead of the Move and Jimmy Page, among others. Their lead guitarist, Eddie Phillips, was even asked by Pete Townshend... Full bio Top Albums and Songs by The Creation 1. Psychedelic Rose View In iTunes
